Verses: 1 mose Meedhiyaan Dhesaththu Aasaariyanaayirundha Than Maamanaagiya Eththirovin Aadugalai Meyththuvandhaan. Avan Aadugalai Vanaandharaththin Pinburaththile Otti, Dhevaparvadhamaagiya Orepmattum Vandhaan.

2 ange Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Oru Mutchediyin Naduvilirundhu Undaana Akkinijuvaalaiyile Nindru Avanukkuth Dharisanamaanaar. Appozhudhu Avan Utruppaarththaan; Mutchedi Akkiniyaal Juvaaliththu Erindhum, Adhu Vendhupogaamal Irundhadhu.
3 appozhudhu Mose: Indha Mutchedi Vendhupogaadhirukkiradhu Enna, Naan Kittappoi Indha Arpudhakaatchiyaip Paarppen Endraan.
4 avan Paarkkumbadi Kitta Varugiradhaik Karththar Kandaar. Mutchediyin Natuvilirundhu Dhevan Avanai Nokki: Mose, Mose Endru Kooppittaar. Avan: Idho, Adiyen Endraan.
5  Appozhudhu Avar: Inge Kittich Seraayaaga; Un Kaalgalil Irukkira Paadharatchaiyaik Kazhatrippodu; Nee Nirkira Idam Parisuththa Boomi Endraar.

6 pinnum Avar: Naan Aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Dhevanum Yaakkobin Dhevanumaagiya Un Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaayirukkiren Endraar. Mose Dhevanai Nokkippaarkkap Bayandhadhinaal, Than Mugaththai Moodikkondaan.

7  Appozhudhu Karththar: Egipthilirukkira En Janaththin Ubaththiravaththai Naan Paarkkave Paarththu, Aalottigalinimiththam Avargal Idugira Kookkuralaik Ketten, Avargal Padugira Vedhanaigalaiyum Arindhirukkiren.

8 avargalai Egipthiyarin Kaikku Vidudhalaiyaakkavum, Avargalai Andhath Dhesaththilirundhu Neekki, Kaanaaniyarum Eththiyarum Emoriyarum Perisiyarum Eviyarum Eboosiyarum Irukkira Idamaagiya Paalum Thenum Odugira Nalamum Visaalamumaana Dhesaththil Kondupoich Serkkavum Iranginen.
9 ippozhudhum Isravel Puththirarin Kookkural En Sannidhiyil Vandhu Ettinadhu; Egipthiyar Avargalai Odukkugira Odukkudhalaiyum Kanden.
10 nee Isravel Puththiraraagiya En Janaththai Egipthilirundhu Azhaiththu Varumbadi Unnaip Paarvonidaththukku Anuppuven Vaa Endraar.
11 appozhudhu Mose Dhevanai Nokki: Paarvonidaththukkup Pogavum, Isravel Puththirarai Egipthilirundhu Azhaiththuvaravum, Naan Emmaaththiram Endraan.

12 adharku Avar: Naan Unnode Iruppen; Nee Janaththai Egipthilirundhu Azhaiththu Vandhapin, Neengal Indha Malaiyil Dhevanukku Aaraadhanai Seyveergal; Naan Unnai Anuppinen Enbadharku Idhuve Adaiyaalam Endraar.

13  Appozhudhu Mose Dhevanai Nokki: Naan Isravel Puththiraridaththil Poi, Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevan Ungalidaththil Ennai Anuppinaar Endru Avargalukkuch Sollumbodhu, Avarudaiya Naamam Enna Endru Avargal Ennidaththil Kettaal, Naan Avargalukku Enna Solluven Endraan.
14 adharkuth Dhevan: Irukkiravaraaga Irukkiren Endru Moseyudane Solli, Irukkiren Enbavar Ennai Ungalidaththukku Anuppinaar Endru Isravel Puththirarode Solvaayaaga Endraar.

15 melum, Dhevan Moseyai Nokki: Aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Dhevanum Yaakkobin Dhevanumaayirukkira Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ennai Ungalidaththukku Anuppinaar Endru Nee Isravel Puththirarukkuch Solvaayaaga; Endraikkum Idhuve En Naamam, Thalaimurai Thalaimuraidhorum Idhuve En Perppirasthaabam.

16 nee Poi, Isravelin Moopparaikkootti, Avargalidaththil: Aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargaludaiya Dhevanaayirukkira Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Enakkuth Dharisanamaagi, Ungalai Nichchayamaaich Sandhiththu, Egipthil Ungalukkuch Seyyappattadhaik Kanden Endrum,

17 naan Ungalai Egipthin Sirumaiyilirundhu Neekki, Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesamaagiya Kaanaaniyar Eththiyar Emoriyar Perisiyar Eviyar Eboosiyarudaiya Dhesaththukkuk Kondupoven Endrum Sonnen Endraar Endru Sollu.

18  Avargal Un Vaakkukkuch Sevikoduppaargal; Appozhudhu Neeyum Isravelin Moopparum Egipthin Raajaavinidaththil Poi: Ebireyarudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalaich Sandhiththaar; Ippozhudhum Naangal Vanaandharaththil Moondru Naal Pirayaanampoi, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Baliyidumbadi Engalaip Pogavidavendumendru Sollungal.
19 aanaalum, Egipthin Raajaa Kaivallamai Kandaalozhiya, Ungalaip Pogavidaan Endru Naan Ariven.
20 aagaiyaal, Naan En Kaiyai Neetti, Egipthin Naduvile Naan Seyyum Sagalavidha Arpudhangalaalum Adhai Vaadhippen; Adharkuppin Avan Ungalaip Pogaviduvaan.
21 appozhudhu Indha Janangalukku Egipthiyarin Kangalil Dhayavu Kidaikkappannuven; Neengal Pogumpodhu Verumaiyaaip Povadhillai.

22 ovvoru Sthireeyum, Than Than Ayalagaththaalidaththilum, Than Than Veettil Thangugiravalidaththilum, Velliyudamaigalaiyum Ponnudaimaigalaiyum Vasthirangalaiyum Kettuvaanguvaal; Avaigalai Ungal Kumaararukkum Ungal Kumaaraththigalukkum Tharippiththu, Egipthiyaraik Kollaiyiduveergal Endraar.
